$
$
Monthly Themed Events
/$
$
/$
$
Get ready to travel back in time and relive the glory days of the 80s at
Tarpon Point's 3rd annual 80s party!
DJ Harry will be spinning all your favorite throwback hits, so grab your crew and dance the night away. Dress to impress in your best 80s attire for a chance to win prizes for best dressed. Join us on the Myakka River for a night of nostalgia and fun as we celebrate the best decade in style. Get your tickets now and let's like it's 1989!
/$
$
/$
$
Tarpon Point Grill & Marina is the ultimate destination for a fun-filled night out! Stop in and experience our monthly themed day where you can dress up in your favorite costume and enter our costume contest for prizes! Don't forget to check out our amazing drink and food specials, as well as live entertainment!
/$
$
Our first event ever was Christmas in July 2022! Now every July, we host a festive event with carolers, decorations, and of course, a delicious Christmas dinner special. We enjoyed throwing this event so much that it evolved into having an event every month! Join us each month and be part of the Tarpon Point Grill & Marina family!
/$
$
/$
$
/$
$
At Tarpon Point Grill & Marina, we specialize in creating memorable events and experiences. Our monthly events that feature a costume contest is no exception. Every month, we invite guests to come dressed in their favorite costumes for a chance to win prizes and bragging rights! Our staff will be dressed to the nines and will provide you with the best service! Costumes are judged by the audience, and the person with the most cheers wins! Whether you're looking for a romantic dinner for two or a fun night out with friends, Tarpon Point Grill & Marina has something for everyone!
/$
$
Enjoy a magnificent view of the Myakka River while seated at one of our tiki tables. To secure your table, please reserve by calling (941) 423-9616. We will have limited reservations on event days, so call as soon as you can!
For a more laid-back atmosphere, we have inside water view tables available for your enjoyment.

$
$
$
/$
$
$
ABOUT OUR RESTAURANT
/$
$
Tarpon Point Grill & Marina is a location with a long history. Going back to the early 50’s when it was
Becky’s Bait & Tackle, then a marina and campground, that ultimately morphed to include a restaurant. In the mid-1990’s, ownership decided to focus solely on operating a successful restaurant, and the marina was closed. It has been operating as a restaurant ever since.
/$
$
/$
$
When you arrive, you will see the tiki hut appearance and overall décor, putting you in that Jimmy Buffet mindset quickly ~ it’s 5 O’clock somewhere, and you’ll be ready for an ice-cold beer or one of our signature cocktails. We schedule live entertainment regularly, consistent with our waterfront-island beach feel. So, kick-back, snack on our fresh oysters, join in on one of our famous monthly themed costume events or listen to live music while watching the sun set on the Myakka River.
/$
$
/$
$
In this latest evolution, we have remodeled and upgraded the facility and premises to reflect our goal of creating a fun and relaxing waterfront environment, where guests can enjoy the freshest and tastiest dishes possible, with an emphasis of course on seafood. We strive to source all ingredients locally, both to support local providers and to obtain the freshest food possible.
/$
$
/$
$
/$
$
If you’re lucky, while you’re enjoying that amazing view - you might just catch a manatee sighting, and
no shortage of gators roaming about as we’re located where the river is still brackish. In fact, the name,
Tarpon Point, derives from an actual geographic reference, just a touch south of our location (but well
within view), which is considered the northernmost point where tarpon will swim in the river.
Oh, and we look forward to helping you coordinate your next group event. We have plenty of space,
whether you want to do it inside or outside, and have numerous options to accommodate your party’s
preferences and your budget. So please consider us for your next work event, wedding rehearsal
dinner, birthday celebration or simply all your friends and family! We look forward to serving you
regardless of how many guests you bring.
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
/$
$
SEA FOODIES
/$
$
Best known for our fresh caught seafood.
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
